name: Bitterroot Valley
description:
This is a quarterly video game magazine that publishes exclusive content from throughout the gaming industry.
See if you can guess that this is what the underbelly of the Halo franchise looks like. I am not sure if this is something that will go away, but if you know who to ask — there is only one person who knows what this actually was, and then only grudgingly. So, this is the Halo 3: ODST Halo 3: ODST is the latest installment of the Halo franchise, and is set in the year 2185. This installment features a new rendition of the iconic ship, ODST, and was released on November 27, 2009. It features a new executive officer, Captain Keyes. The Halo franchise has spawned a lot of brilliant titles, and of course, they all share a common theme, a ship that seems to have awkwardly cropped up on every one of them.
